ingredients.ingredient: 3 (10 ounce) cans refrigerated biscuit dough, separated and cut into quarters

cookingTips: Coat biscuit pieces evenly in cinnamon-sugar mixture for consistent sweetness
Fill muffin cups until nearly full to create tall, golden muffins
Cool slightly before inverting onto serving plate to release caramel coating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the user how refrigerated dough creates convenience while achieving monkey bread's signature gooey caramel coating.
